title: Ticket #6206: Better error message if node job submit file creates multiple clusters
description:
If the submit file for a DAG node job creates more than one cluster, the resulting error message in the dagman.out file is kind of confusing: 

  03/29/17 11:22:32 ERROR: node NodeA: job ID in userlog submit event
  (4896.0.0) doesn't match ID reported earlier by submit command (4897.0.0)!'
  Aborting DAG; set DAGMAN_ABORT_ON_SCARY_SUBMIT to false if you are *sure*
  this shouldn't cause an abort.

I think we should have a clearer error message, something like: 

  This submit file created multiple HTCondor clusters, which is not allowed
  for DAG node jobs.
creator: wenger
